languages.text: На мостике множество следов бедствия — трупы, которые наспех убирают лекари, разбитые машины и следы крови на стенах и полу. Среди мертвецов — множество бесценных специалистов и офицеров, однако остатки управляющего состава уже собрались вокруг гололитической карты и обсуждают план действий.

traits.locale_text: Мостик похож на поле битвы — пол устлан трупами, когитаторы повреждены, а сержанты докладывают об остатках ядовитых паров. Лекари в респираторах пакуют посиневшие трупы, на некоторых видны огнестрельные и колотые раны. Матросы наспех заваривают трубы, а остатки офицеров пытаются привести машины в рабочее состояние.

languages.text: The bridge is littered with evidence of disaster — corpses being hastily removed by healers, broken machinery, and bloodstains all over the bulkheads and deck. Among the dead are many irreplaceable specialists and officers, but the remnants of the command have already gathered around the hololithic map and are in the process of discussing the plan of action.
languages.original_text: На мостике множество следов бедствия — трупы, которые наспех убирают лекари, разбитые машины и следы крови на стенах и полу. Среди мертвецов — множество бесценных специалистов и офицеров, однако остатки управляющего состава уже собрались вокруг гололитической карты и обсуждают план действий.

traits.locale_text: The bridge is littered with evidence of disaster — corpses being hastily removed by healers, broken machinery, and bloodstains all over the walls and floor. Among the dead are many priceless specialists and officers, but the remnants of the command have already gathered around the hololithic map and are in the process of discussing the next plan of action.

The bridge is littered with evidence of disaster — corpses being hastily removed by healers, broken machinery, and bloodstains all over the walls and floor. Among the dead are many priceless specialists and officers, but the remnants of the command have already gathered around the hololithic map and are in the process of discussing the next plan of action.

The bridge is littered with evidence of disaster — corpses being hastily removed by healers, broken machinery, and bloodstains all over the bulkheads and deck. Among the dead are many irreplaceable specialists and officers, but the remnants of the command have already gathered around the hololithic map and are in the process of discussing the plan of action.

The bridge is littered with evidence of disaster — corpses being hastily removed by healers, broken machinery, and bloodstains all over the bulkheads and deck. Among the dead are many irreplaceable specialists and officers, but the remnants of the command have already gathered around the hololithic map and are in the process of discussing the plan of action.

The bridge is littered with evidence of disaster — corpses being hastily removed by healers, broken machinery, and bloodstains all over the bulkheads and deck. Among the dead are many irreplaceable specialists and officers, but the remnants of the command have already gathered around the hololithic map and are in the process of discussing the plan of action.

languages.text: El desastre del puente salta a la vista: los médicos están retirando cadáveres con prisa, la maquinaria está hecha pedazos y las mamparas y la cubierta están llenas de sangre. Entre los muertos hay numerosos oficiales y especialistas insustituibles, pero los pocos mandos restantes ya se han reunido en torno al mapa hololítico para debatir el siguiente paso.
languages.original_text: The bridge is littered with evidence of disaster — corpses being hastily removed by healers, broken machinery, and bloodstains all over the bulkheads and deck. Among the dead are many irreplaceable specialists and officers, but the remnants of the command have already gathered around the hololithic map and are in the process of discussing the plan of action.

traits.locale_text: El desastre del puente salta a la vista: los médicos están retirando cadáveres con prisa, la maquinaria está hecha pedazos y las mamparas y la cubierta están llenas de sangre. Entre los muertos hay numerosos oficiales y especialistas insustituibles, pero los pocos mandos restantes ya se han reunido en torno al mapa hololítico para debatir el siguiente paso.

languages.text: 舰桥上到处遍布着这场灾难留下的疮痍——被医护人员匆忙搬走的尸体、被破坏的机器，以及遍布舱壁与甲板的血迹。许多无可替代的专家与军官都在这场战斗中丧生，但指挥部的残存人员已经聚集到了全息地图周围，讨论接下来的行动计划。
languages.original_text: The bridge is littered with evidence of disaster — corpses being hastily removed by healers, broken machinery, and bloodstains all over the bulkheads and deck. Among the dead are many irreplaceable specialists and officers, but the remnants of the command have already gathered around the hololithic map and are in the process of discussing the plan of action.

traits.locale_text: 舰桥上到处遍布着这场灾难留下的疮痍——被医护人员匆忙搬走的尸体、被破坏的机器，以及遍布舱壁与甲板的血迹。许多无可替代的专家与军官都在这场战斗中丧生，但指挥部的残存人员已经聚集到了全息地图周围，讨论接下来的行动计划。

languages.text: ブリッジには災害の痕跡があちこちに見られた。治療士が急いで運んだ死体、壊れた機械、隔壁やデッキ中についた血痕などでグチャグチャだ。死者の中には貴重な専門家や士官もたくさんいたが、生存した司令達はすでにホロリシックマップの周りに集まって、どう行動するか話し合っている。
languages.original_text: The bridge is littered with evidence of disaster — corpses being hastily removed by healers, broken machinery, and bloodstains all over the bulkheads and deck. Among the dead are many irreplaceable specialists and officers, but the remnants of the command have already gathered around the hololithic map and are in the process of discussing the plan of action.

traits.locale_text: ブリッジには災害の痕跡があちこちに見られた。治療士が急いで運んだ死体、壊れた機械、隔壁やデッキ中についた血痕などでグチャグチャだ。死者の中には貴重な専門家や士官もたくさんいたが、生存した司令達はすでにホロリシックマップの周りに集まって、どう行動するか話し合っている。

languages.text: Die Brücke ist übersät mit Spuren der Katastrophe ... Leichen, die eilig von Heilern entfernt werden, defekte Maschinen und Blut an den Schotten und auf Deck. Unter den Toten sind viele unersetzliche Spezialisten und Offiziere, aber die Reste des Kommandos haben sich bereits um die hololithische Karte versammelt und sind dabei, den Aktionsplan zu besprechen.
languages.original_text: The bridge is littered with evidence of disaster — corpses being hastily removed by healers, broken machinery, and bloodstains all over the bulkheads and deck. Among the dead are many irreplaceable specialists and officers, but the remnants of the command have already gathered around the hololithic map and are in the process of discussing the plan of action.

languages.text: Le pont porte les marques encore fraîches du désastre qui s'y est produit : des cadavres emmenés hâtivement par les soigneurs, des machines endommagées et des taches de sang sur toutes les surfaces. Parmi les victimes se trouvent de nombreux spécialistes et officiers irremplaçables, mais ce qu'il reste du commandement s'est déjà rassemblé autour de la carte hololithique pour discuter d'un plan d'action.
languages.original_text: The bridge is littered with evidence of disaster — corpses being hastily removed by healers, broken machinery, and bloodstains all over the bulkheads and deck. Among the dead are many irreplaceable specialists and officers, but the remnants of the command have already gathered around the hololithic map and are in the process of discussing the plan of action.

traits.locale_text: Le pont porte les marques encore fraîches du désastre qui s'y est produit : des cadavres emmenés hâtivement par les soigneurs, des machines endommagées et des taches de sang sur toutes les surfaces. Parmi les victimes se trouvent de nombreux spécialistes et officiers irremplaçables, mais ce qu'il reste du commandement s'est déjà rassemblé autour de la carte hololithique pour discuter d'un plan d'action.

languages.text: Köprü, âdeta bir afetten çıkmış gibi. Cesetleri alelacele taşıyan şifacılar, bozuk makineler, bölmelere ve güvertenin her yerine sıçramış kan lekeleri... Ölenler arasında yeri doldurulamaz pek çok uzman ve subay olsa da kalan yetkililer; hololitik harita etrafında toplanmış, eylem planını tartışıyor.
languages.original_text: The bridge is littered with evidence of disaster — corpses being hastily removed by healers, broken machinery, and bloodstains all over the bulkheads and deck. Among the dead are many irreplaceable specialists and officers, but the remnants of the command have already gathered around the hololithic map and are in the process of discussing the plan of action.

traits.locale_text: Köprü, bir afetten çıkmış gibi. Cesetleri alelacele taşıyan şifacılar, bozuk makineler, bölmelere ve güvertenin her yerine sıçramış kan lekeleri... Ölenler arasında yeri doldurulamaz pek çok uzman ve subay olsa da kalan yetkililer, hololitik harita etrafında toplanmış eylem planını tartışma sürecinde.
